Package com.nrg948.dashboard.annotations

Annotation Interface DashboardDefinition

@Target(TYPE) public @interface DashboardDefinition
Annotation that marks a class as a dashboard definition.

The annotation is applied to a class that contains fields and/or methods annotated with other dashboard widget annotations (e.g., DashboardBooleanBox, DashboardCommand, etc.).
